description:
This week I have some very exciting news — we have begun filming all of our videos in high definition! That means a larger, wider picture with incredible quality. We still have a few standard definition films that we will be releasing over the next little while, but from now on it's all hi def!

So, this update marks our first foray into the world of hi def, and it's a good one. I love mixing newbie straight guys with gay guys who have a little bit of experience. Brett Mathews has done a few films for a couple of small studios, so he knows how to fuck. Plus, I really like his look — lean and muscular with pale skin and a nice hairy chest.

Parker has gotten more comfortable with the whole gay sex thing and is now able to just relax and enjoy himself. As I've gotten to know Parker, I've found that he really loves three things: 1) to have his ass eaten out, 2) to fuck a warm, tight hole, and 3) to eat his own cum. Luckily, this film has all three! My favorite part is at the end, when Parker shoots his load all over Brett's face and then leans down and starts kissing him. There's cum all over the place and Parker is just in heaven!
title: Parker & Brett
